channel.title: APIDays on Gian Lorenzetto

item.title: APIDays 2016 Highlights
item.description: My notes and highlights from APIDays 2016 in Melbourne. Slides are available for most presentations and are linked to from the section headings. You can also get to the slides via the abstract pages for each talk, which you can get to by clicking through the links to each individual talk in the APIDays program. Steve Sammartino - Welcome to Startup Land # This was the first keynote on day one and kicked things off with some interesting thinking around innovation, what it is, what it means and how it can challenge older / larger organisations who have operated in the same way for a long time.
